reviews.review: fuck killing floor 2, this is where the real shit is at
Fun, progressif, légèrement répétitif mais un jeu avec de très très gros challenges :)
A classic co-op survival horde shooter with few flaws that still looks great despite its age. After you get used to the wonky hitboxes you'll be dropping specimens in no time.

El formato de unirte a otros 5 jugadores y resistir contra oleadas practicamente interminables de zombies, que además poseen distintas clases, algunas mas estresantes y frustrantes que otras, hacen de este juego muy adictivo. Tengo buenos recuerdoss jugando este título, tanto solo en el modo online, como con amigos. El sistema de privilegios junto con los logros hacen que el "farmeo" no se vuelva algo aburrido y te den ganas de subir la dificultad y dominar cada vez mas mapas. Actualmente con el Killing Floor 2 cada vez menos gente juega este titulo, pero en su momento estaba llenisimo, con una comunidad muy amigable y abierta. Aun hoy sigue siendo un gran juego, totalmente recomendado :)
Yeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah buddy that's a good game.
This is a really fun game to play if you're bored and/or just looking for a simple zombie-ish themed shooter game.

КРУТО ШУТЕР ПРЕКОЛИНЫ И ЗОМБИ ТАК НУ ВСЕ

This game is amazing. An absolute blast to play, albeit a bit difficult to grasp for your first time.

You see, this game follows Counter-Strike rules, as in, you go faster when you have your knife out. So it really sucks when you have to run away or are in a tight spot. Plus, this game isn't as easy as its sequel. You can die pretty easily if you aren't careful, or try to breakaway from your team. You're all in this together, and that's what I like. It actually forces cooperation between people. It also has you rely on the welding mechanic, forcing enemies to reroute to areas that are easier to handle. 

Each class has their own unique purpose for the team. Firebug is sort of like crowd control, and can burn or chip away at an enemy zed's health. Sharpshooters pick off weaker zeds or weaken strong zeds for teammates. Demolition is much more focused on crowd control, as well as taking out strong zeds. Commando is mostly just the starter class, but it has it's own benefits as well. Medic is...well, quite obvious, and Support Specialist focuses on welding doors, as well as having shotguns to pack a punch to strong zeds, or clear out hordes of weaker zeds.

I should also mention the characters, there's a few you start with. The other characters you'll need to pay for, which isn't a problem, and is understandable. But some characters (particularly the 'single' character packs) are priced too high, and you're better off waiting for a sale. Most characters use the same voicelines, but there are a few here and there with unique voicelines. So some character packs are disappointing, and others are worth the price.

So if you're looking for something that gives you a blast, while also giving you a challenge and multiple play styles. This game will be worth your money.
Awesome game, even after years of playing.
though this game may be 10 years old its still fun and still a game worth playing.
The bullpup is a top 10 videogame weapon of all time.
Weapons have a real weight to them, and kills are very satisfying. Especially fun with friends, this one's a classic for me

Killing Floor has been one of my favorite games for years. It's a good looking game for its age, it doesn't require a lot, and the game play is smooth. Running through the farm with a couple buddies on voice chat is the example of a good time. If you like Zombies, FPS's, Co-Op, and open-world wave battle type of games (not sure there are many of those out there), then you'll enjoy Killing Floor.

In short, it's one of my favorite games. There are a few irritating glitches, but it's been one of the few games I keep going back to, and in my opinion, it's superior to KF2. 

My only complaint is how long it takes to level up the Commando perk: It's the only perk I'd seriously recommend using a 'Perk' map to level up, simply because of how slowly it advances in comparison to the other perks: In short, it's stupid. 

Beyond that, everything else pretty much works.

It's fun chaos. I would say Killing Floor 2 is probably a better game, but this one is still fun if you want to mess around in something older. Definitely worth the few dollars I spent on it all those years ago
Хорошая игра на несколько вечеров с друзьями. Очень сильно рекомендую если вам после работы нечем заняться.
